DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to a pill in the form of a small rounded soluble container with medicine or an active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect having been taken._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Determining the number or amount of something.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a pill in the form of a small rounded soluble container with medicine or an active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect having been taken.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A pill in the form of a small rounded soluble container with medicine inside.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A solid contained within either a hard or soft soluble shell, usually prepared from gelatin.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

Concepts.definition: Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Determining the number or amount of something.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:An event or sequence of events that constitute round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
Determining the number or amount of something.
